description: Meiden Fassa is one of the most prestigious magnates in the merchantile country of Astoria who takes full advantage of his influence and close ties to http://anidb.net/ch84887 [King Aston]. He sits in Astoria`s High Council, and managed to arrange his http://anidb.net/ch39064 [son]`s betrothal to http://anidb.net/ch39058 [Princess Mirana].
name: Meiden Fassa
